response.overview: Work can be rewarding or discouraging with no equilibrium. For many people in today's automated and virtual world, the only thing they can do is work. Which is either for financial reasons or to get away from the issues in their lives and it can become self consuming. This short film follows a man who was the head of his department requiring staff interaction to retain control, however through the covid pandemic was forced to work remotely. With the cause and effect of becoming a workaholic and no longer being able to distinguish between work life balance boundaries.
response.tagline: Work can be useful, but what happens when work begins to take precedence over all other priorities in your life?
response.title: Burnout
